title: To an Inconstant One - speaker claims that he will

content.prompt: In the final stanza (lines 25-32), the speaker claims that he will

choices.label: support his lover in her choice of a new suitor
maintain a measured sense of detachment from his lover and her new suitor
revel in criticizing the faults of his lover and her new suitor
try to keep himself from feeling too sad due to the loss of his lover

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
